item.itunes:author: Dimitri Snowden & Ashley Snowden
item.title: Shift Gets Real 101 - Why I Love You
item.description: In this episode we talk about "Why I love You" and what it takes to stay INside of love!
item.itunes:subtitle: Shift Gets Real with Dimitri and Ashley Snowden
item.itunes:summary: Shift Gets Real with powerful and shifting conversations from the mindware of Dimitri and Ashley Snowden. New episode every Wednesday.

item.itunes:author: Dimitri Snowden & Ashley Snowden
item.title: Shift Gets Real 102: Culture, Blackness and Utter Confusion!
item.description: The differences between race, culture and ethnicity were learned the hard way! This weeks episode @dimitrisnowden and @ashleyksnowden talk about family culture, blackness and utter confusion! Our friend Nichole at @africanancestry can help clear this up!
item.itunes:subtitle: Shift Gets Real with Dimitri and Ashley Snowden
item.itunes:summary: Shift Gets Real with powerful and shifting conversations from the mindware of Dimitri and Ashley Snowden. New episode every Wednesday.

item.itunes:author: Dimitri Snowden & Ashley Snowden
item.title: Shift Gets Real 103: Infidelity
item.description: This weeks episode @dimitrisnowden and @ashleyksnowden talk about one of the most taboo subjects in relationships and marriages - infidelity Find out the Snowdens shifted through it!
item.itunes:subtitle: Shift Gets Real with Dimitri and Ashley Snowden
item.itunes:summary: Shift Gets Real with powerful and shifting conversations from the mindware of Dimitri and Ashley Snowden. New episode every Wednesday.

item.itunes:author: Dimitri Snowden & Ashley Snowden
item.title: Shift Gets Real 104: Parenting Day by Day
item.description: This weeks episode @dimitrisnowden and @ashleyksnowden talk about birth, discipline and how they intentionally parent day by day!
item.itunes:subtitle: Shift Gets Real with Dimitri and Ashley Snowden
